            Adeyinka Glows
          
          
            
          
          
            
            # body { background-color:steelblue;}
            I am a data analytics enthusiast living in the Baulkham Hill Area Sydney, Australia. I love using data wrangling, data analysis and data visualization to answer question of public interest as well as to tell full story about events and processes by leveraging on granular detail to target strategic objectives and improve outcomes. Currently I am higher degree candidate in the University of Sydney. I love talking about football,community and people, politics and policy,live and livelihood,crime and causal inference.

articles.title: COMPLEX NETWORK INTERDEPENDENCE: GAME AND GRAPH THEORY WEBSITE
articles.description: Welcome to the website where we explore data analytics and multi-agent complex Interractions via Network representaion based on graph and game theory with R .I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents: Dynamical Behavior of scale free network of Agents arriving and deciding whether to play defection D or cooperation C based on prisoner Dilemma incentive structure

      About
    
          
      
    
    
    
      Adeyinka Falaye
      Computer/Data Analytics Scientist
      Unit 45/21-25 Seven Hills, Baulkham Hills NSW 2153

      
      |
       +61 4040 63256 |
       .com |
       falayeadeyinka@outlook.com |
       falaye |
       falaye-sydney |
       falaye |
      

      
      # .columns{display:flex;}
      # body{background-color:lightblue}
      # h1{color:red;}  
      # h2{color:forestgreen;}

      Australian Permanent Resident
      
      Some fun facts about me
      I just love the whole process of gathering and interpreting data from a variety of sources using wide rage of tools to help in leveraging on details to target quality outcomes and visual experience.
      For over ten years I have routinely taught dozens of mathematics,statistical computation and computer programming courses at University level
      I have over 10 plus years of experience with Data Analysis,Executive data visualization,Machine Learning using R language and Python.
      I maintain high level of proficient in the use of over 400 essential packages and I have written more than 20,000 lines of codes in R across wide range of application domain data sets from science to engineering,from health to socioeconomic as well as spatial analysis of data sets of settlements and boundaries .
      I believe in the power of great team,efficient teamwork,positive thinking,big dream, good habits,hard-work ,reviewing of outcomes and love in the heart in order to achieve institutional/organizational strategic goals in the short, medium and long term .
      
      
      Education
      
      2019-Present Australia HRD Candidate in the Analysis of Complex System Networks and Strategic Interraction ( University of Sydney)
      
      
      2015 Nigeria Master of Computer Science (University of Lagos)
      
      
      2006 Nigeria Bachelor of Mathematics with Computer Science (Federal University of technology )
      
      
      
      Experience
      
      Technical Skill set in R Python HTML Javascript PostgreSQL/MySQLObject-oriented design Design and implement database structures (Over ten years of experience in data analytics associated with teaching, research and academic publications)
      
      
      Professional Skill set in Effective communication, Team player,Strong problem solver,Good time management (Over ten years of experience in Teaching, research and collaboration)
      
      
      
      Publications
      
      
      1. O’Hara-Wild, M., & Hyndman, R. (2021). Vitae: Curriculum vitae for r markdown. https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=vitae
      
      
      2. Müller, K., & Wickham, H. (2021). Tibble: Simple data frames. https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=tibble
